title: The Block's Wombat reveals he and wife Ruby Walton have welcomed a baby girl
text:
The Block star and series favourite Wombat has revealed that he and his wife Ruby Walton have welcomed a baby girl.

The former reality TV star took to Instagram on Sunday to share a sweet snap of himself holding the couple's newborn and revealed that they named her Charlie Luna Price.

Wombat - whose real name is Clint Price - explained that the pair had their baby weeks ago, but have been enjoying their time 'getting to know her' before announcing the news with fans.

'My awesome wife gave birth to our little rascal': The Block's Wombat reveals he and Ruby Walton have welcomed a baby girl... and reveals the newborn's sweet name

'Let me introduce Miss Charlie Luna Price,' his post read.

'A couple of weeks ago my awesome wife gave birth to our little rascal daughter and we have all spent the last couple of weeks getting to know her (including her big brother Jake and our little dog Pip).'

He added: 'I'm back at work tomorrow and I sure am going to miss hanging out with them all (lucky I only work across the road so I can duck home for lunch or even smoko (sic).'

Sweet: Wombat, pictured with wife Ruby Walton, named their tiny tot Charlie Luna Price

He also added hashtags including: 'Little ginger' and 'she has my eyebrows.'

Last month, Ruby took to Instagram to share two sweet snaps of their newborn sleeping, revealing they welcomed Charlie on September 25.

'Charlie girl,' she captioned the sweet snaps, adding a flower emoji.

New addition! Last month, Ruby took to Instagram to share two sweet snaps of their newborn sleeping, revealing they welcomed Charlie on September 25

Baby number two! Charlie is Wombat's second child, with the star having a ten year old son from a previous relationship

Last month, Wombat and Ruby celebrated their first wedding anniversary.

Ruby shared a cute photo of the couple on Instagram and wrote: 'One whole trip round the sun being married to my best mate.'

Wombat rose to fame on The Block alongside co-star Sticks in the 2017 series of the popular renovation show.

Charlie is Wombat's second child - the star has a ten-year-old son from a previous relationship.
description: The Block's Wombat has revealed that he and wife Ruby Walton have welcomed a baby girl.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
